19000435.<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……:

19000436.<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>當時:

19000437.<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>但是:

19000438.<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>或許:

19000439.<start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>……:
